wikipedia_page.main: Leonard W. Seymour is Professor of Gene Therapy within the University of Oxford's oncology division. As a cancer-oriented translational researcher, he investigates technologies utilized to enhance targeted therapy's (e.g. drugs, genes, oncolytic viruses) delivery and develops related biological therapeutics under the support of Cancer Research UK.

response: He married Shelley MacDonald of Ottawa in 1979, and they have two children, Amy and Emily. The couple separated amicably in 2007. His brother Leonard W. Seymour is Professor of gene therapy at Oxford University.
